mapper.select: SELECT biomass_straw.*,county.COUNTY_NAME FROM biomass_straw LEFT JOIN county ON biomass_straw.COUNTY_ID=county.COUNTY_ID where biomass_straw.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into biomass_straw (id, county_id, scc_code, source_descrip, CROPS, CROPS_OUTPUT, GRASS_VALLEY_RATIO, OPEN_BURNING_RATIO, BURNING_RATIO, note, year, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, co_emission, voc_emission, pm_emission, so2_emission, nox_emission, nh3_emission, oc_emission, bc_emission ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crops,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cropsOutput,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{grassValleyRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{openBurningRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{burningRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pmEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, scc_code = #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_descrip = #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CROPS = #{crops,jdbcType=CHAR}, CROPS_OUTPUT = #{cropsOutput,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, GRASS_VALLEY_RATIO = #{grassValleyRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, OPEN_BURNING_RATIO = #{openBurningRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BURNING_RATIO = #{burningRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm_emission = #{pmEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}
mapper.update:
update biomass_straw
county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR},
scc_code = #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
source_descrip = #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CROPS = #{crops,jdbcType=CHAR},
CROPS_OUTPUT = #{cropsOutput,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
GRASS_VALLEY_RATIO = #{grassValleyRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
OPEN_BURNING_RATIO = #{openBurningRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
BURNING_RATIO = #{burningRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm_emission = #{pmEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
